p: NIH-3T3 cell monolayers were infected with MCMV WT and MCMV IVL at an MOI of 0.1, incubated at 37°C for 1h, upon which the inoculum was removed, cells were washed with PBS, and supplied with fresh medium. Cells were incubated for 6 days; the supernatant was harvested every day and stored at -80°C until titration.
